entry.title: Lookat 1.4.3 released
entry.content:
I'm pleased to anounce that Lookat/Bekijk 1.4.3 has been released.

This new stable version will compile correctly with LLVM/clang.

The new stable version 1.4.3 is available at http://www.wagemakers.be/english/programs/lookat Or at the Git repository at GNU savannah http://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/lookat.git

Have fun...

entry.title: yum install lookat
entry.content:
"yum install lookat" works on Fedora now ;-)

Thanks Christopher!

``` [staf@vicky ~]$ sudo yum install lookat [sudo] password for staf: Loaded plugins: langpacks, presto, refresh-packagekit, security Repository google-chrome is listed more than once in the configuration Resolving Dependencies --> Running transaction check ---> Package lookat.x86_64 0:1.4.2-1.fc18 will be installed --> Finished Dependency Resolution

entry.title: lookat/bekijk has landed in fedora
entry.content:
Thanks to Christopher Meng

Lookat has landed in Fedora.

https://admin.fedoraproject.org/pkgdb/acls/name/lookat

entry.title: Lookat/Bekijk 1.4.3rc1 released
entry.content:
Trying to release more often...

The first release candicate of lookat 1.4.3 has been released.

ChangeLog

Lookat / Bekijk 1.4.3rc1 ( 27 Apr 2013 )
  • Fixed compile issue with llvm clang

Lookat 1.4.3rc1 is available at: http://www.wagemakers.be/english/programs/lookat , download it directly Download latest development release (1.4.3rc1).

Or at the Git repository at GNU savannah http://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/lookat.git/

entry.title: Lookat/Bekijk 1.4.2 released
entry.content:
Finaly a long overdue release of Lookat / Bekijk the userfriendly file browser.

The new stable version 1.4.2 is available at the http://www.wagemakers.be/english/programs/lookat

Or at the Git repository at GNU savannah http://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/lookat.git

1.4.2 is a maintenance release. When there are more than 24 hours in a day I'll start with the long waited utf-8 support ;-)

ChangeLog

Lookat / Bekijk 1.4.2 ( 11 Dec 2012 )
  • Lookat 1.4.2rc2 has been released as 1.4.2
Lookat / Bekijk 1.4.2rc2 ( 2 Sep 2012 )
  • Added FreeBSD patch
  • Added redhat specfile
  • Added debian package dir
  • Corrected mirror manpage errors
  • xmalloc.c updated for non compatible GNU malloc for systems like AIX
Lookat / Bekijk 1.4.2rc1 ( 2 Nov 2011 )
  • Lookat 1.4.2rc1 is a maintenance release that resolves compile issues on some 64bits systems.
